rounds.title: Round 1: Test reaction
rounds.description:
Click on the circle or square created as fast as you can! Difficulties are constied. 
You can only play once. Once you lose, your score will be recorded.
rounds.name: GameOne

rounds.title: Round 2: Snake Game
rounds.description:
Use the arrow keys to move a 'snake' around the board. As the snake finds food, it eats the food, and thereby grows larger. The game ends when the snake either moves off the screen or moves into itself. The goal is to make the snake as large as possible before that happens. 
You can only play once. Once you lose, your score will be recorded.
rounds.name: GameTwo

rounds.title: Round 3: Breakout Game
rounds.description:
Using a single ball, knock down as many bricks as possible by using the walls and/or the paddle below to hit the ball against the bricks and eliminate them. If the paddle misses the ball's rebound, the game is over. 
You can only play once. Once you lose, your score will be recorded.
rounds.name: GameThree

rounds.title: Round 4: Tetris Game
rounds.description:
Move the pieces using arrow keys in specific ways, your game is over if your pieces reach the top of the screen and you can only remove pieces from the screen by filling all the blank space in a line. 
You can only play once. Once you lose, your score will be recorded.
rounds.name: GameFour

rounds.title: Round 5: Tower Blocks Game
rounds.description:
Using spacebar place the moving block, covering the whole surface of previous level. If you miss the surface of previous level completely then game is over. 
You can only play once. Once you lose, your score will be recorded.
rounds.name: GameFive

rounds.title: Round 6: T-Rex Game
rounds.description:
Using spacebar start jumping over cacti and upcoming obstacles. 
You can only play once. Once you lose, your score will be recorded.
rounds.name: GameSix
